column14: Love the soap, hate the pump. Just use a flip cap. It would be a better experience.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
column14: First time trying a black soap body wash but I'm immediately satisfied. Will keep replenishing as part of my shower time ritual. I haven't found this to be drying as soaps are.

column14: I like ordering from the website better. The products on here seem older. My pump never works when I order off Amazon. Even the labels are different on here. The only plus is that it ships faster from here.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
column14: I have been using this product for a while and it is great for my skin and I love the scent and how it lathers up. And I like the fact that it is a black woman owned company that gets its shea butter directly from Africa.
